1: Lord, who may be a guest in your home?[b] Who may live on your holy hill?[c]
2: Whoever lives a blameless life,[d] does what is right, and speaks honestly.[e]
3: He[f] does not slander,[g] or do harm to others,[h] or insult his neighbor.[i]
4: He despises a reprobate,[j] but honors the Lord's loyal followers.[k] He makes firm commitments and does not renege on his promise.[l]
5: He does not charge interest when he lends his money.[m] He does not take bribes to testify against the innocent.[n] The one who lives like this[o] will never be shaken.
